original_text: All these were made of costly stones, cut according to measure, sawed with saws, back and front, even from the foundation to the coping, and from the outside to the great court.
korean_text: 이 집들은 안팎을 모두 귀하고 다듬은 돌로 지었으니 크기대로 톱으로 켠 것이라 그 초석에서 처마까지와 외면에서 큰 뜰에 이르기까지 다 그러하니

sentences.original_text: All these were made of costly stones
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것은 값비싼 돌로 만들어졌으며

sentences.original_text: even from the foundation to the coping
and from the outside to the great court
